articles.title: OpenAI is building five new Stargate data centers with Oracle and SoftBank - TechCrunch

articles.content: OpenAI announced on Tuesday that it plans to build five new AI data centers across the United States with partners Oracle and SoftBank through its Stargate project. The new data centers will bring St… [+702 chars]
